attributes.action: Stop the jailing of pregnant women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the jailing of pregnant women in favour of community service or tagging and to defer the jailing of pregnant women who have committed violent crimes until after birth. To protect the rights of the child who has a right to be with its mother, unless the mother is violent and abusive to children. The child has not committed a crime and should be entitled to spend a significant amount of time with its natural mother. The child also has a human right to being fed naturally and separation is inhumane.
